entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
